dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially.; Includes title in cartouche, coat of arms and illustrations of ships, mermaids, and sea monsters.; Includes southwest section of North America (Americae).; Latin text on verso.; In lower right on verso: 48.; From: Theatrum orbis terrarum.; Double page map.; Publication year provided by dealer.|34.5 x 49.5 centimeters, on sheet 40 x 55 centimeters|Scale not given|General Map Collection
